QuestionText: What is a common benefit of meal planning?

QuestionText: What should you do if you spill something on the floor?
OptionA: Leave it for someone else to clean
OptionB: Clean it up immediately to prevent slipping
OptionC: Step on it to spread it around

QuestionText: How can you stay organized when managing multiple tasks?
OptionA: By doing everything at the last minute
OptionB: By prioritizing tasks and using a planner or calendar
OptionC: By delegating all tasks to others

QuestionText: What is a good habit to practice for maintaining a clean living space?
OptionA: Cleaning only when the mess becomes overwhelming
OptionB: Cleaning a little bit every day
OptionD: Hiring someone to clean for you daily

QuestionText: What is a simple way to reduce waste at home?
OptionB: Buying in bulk and using reusable bags and containers
OptionC: Recycling all materials regardless of contamination

QuestionText: How can you ensure your personal safety when walking alone at night?
OptionA: Wearing headphones and avoiding eye contact
OptionB: Staying on well-lit paths and being aware of surroundings
OptionC: Taking a shortcut through a dimly lit alley
